Syslog.Message: [{messageid} tag="{organization.name}.{apiproxy.name}.{environment.name}"] Ip Address - {logIpAddress}, requestPath - {logRequestPath}, subject - {logSubject}, scope - {logScope}, patient - {logPatient}, clientId - {logClientId}, timeTaken - {client.received.end.timestamp - client.sent.end.timestamp}
